core.admin

Class AdminAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.account.AccountManager<Admin>
      • core.admin.AdminAccountManager

  • public class AdminAccountManager
extends AccountManager<Admin>
    Class that manages Admin's.

      Requests to create an Admin with input username and password, and an Email address is also needed for this Admin to receive any notification about the result of this Admin account creation

    • Method Detail

      • requestAdminCreation

        public boolean requestAdminCreation(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String email)
        Requests to create an Admin with input username and password, and an Email address is also needed for this Admin to receive any notification about the result of this Admin account creation
        Parameters:
        username - The username that the Admin wants to use
        password - The password that the Admin wants to use
        email - The email that the Admin wants to use to receive any notification of the result
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if and only if the request is successfully created by admin

      • createAdmin

        public boolean createAdmin(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
        Creates an Admin
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the admin
        password - the password of the admin
        Returns:
        true if successful

        Create the initial admin

      • getFormattedAdminCreationRequests

        public java.util.Map<Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>,Pair<Admin,java.lang.String>> getFormattedAdminCreationRequests()
        Return a string representation of all the admin creation requests
        Returns:
        a string representation of all the admin creation requests

      • acceptAdminCreationRequest

        public boolean acceptAdminCreationRequest(java.lang.String currAdminUsername,
                                          Pair<Admin,java.lang.String> request)
        Accept the request of creation of new admin, which means added new admin if and only if this admin does not exists. Then remove this request. Return true if and only if this request is accepted
        Parameters:
        currAdminUsername - the list of current admin's username
        request - a pair which value1 is new admin
        Returns:
        true if and only if the request is accepted

      • denyAdminCreationRequest

        public boolean denyAdminCreationRequest(java.lang.String currAdminUsername,
                                        Pair<Admin,java.lang.String> request)
        Deny the request of creation of new admin, which means deny new admin addition if and only if this admin does not exists. Then remove this request. Return true if and only if this request is denied
        Parameters:
        currAdminUsername - the list of current admin's username
        request - a pair which value1 is new admin
        Returns:
        true if and only if the request is denied
